comment.body:
You can block it by adding these rules to user rules or creating your own.
```adblock
||youtube.com/embed/$domain=ghostclouds.xyz,important
ghostclouds.xyz##.elementor-widget-video
```

comment.body: Remove them, e.g. `##a[href^="http://x.com/intent/tweet/?"]` has a few publicwww hits but no actual use if you visit the pages. Should I spend time to demonstrate for each rules? Better to remove all added `x.com` rules except for those actually used. There rules most affect performance.

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> `AdGuard Content Blocker` (not AG for Android) can apply only basic rules. `$$` or `#%#` and others automatically removed from filter version for AdGuard Content Blocker.

Might be safer to include unless we are sure we never add classic rules, as applying only classic rules without advanced ones can harm.

```suggestion
!#if (!adguard_ext_safari && !adguard_app_ios && !ext_ublock)
```

`AdGuard Content Blocker` (not AG for Android) can apply only basic rules. `$$` or `#%#` and others automatically removed from filter version for AdGuard Content Blocker.

Btw you can use this button if suggestion is ok

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8361299/df31e634-1597-4454-8973-af40d41121d6)

and/or press `Resolve conversation`.

comment.body:
>yes you're right. it looks like the AdBlockID filter is still causing this pop up to appear (maybe because the rules collide)
and no problem with EasyPrivacy filter

`EasyPrivacy` was just an example of "third-party" filter list, I didn't mean that it causes detection.

>btw, is it still impossible to delete the banner on this player?

Should be fixed in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7fc803450f5e6800781d3deb6abbf272d7fa4f63, but it may stop working if they will change something again.

issue.title: Update block list filters with newly discovered trackers and spam sites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Sites are not yet blocked and kept being bypassed by filters as it is not yet in the block lists.

- `*.goeco.social`
- `*.trackswork.site`
- `*.lesterunkind.top`
- `*.sonraifishnet.website`

### Proposed solution

Update filter block lists with:

> ||goeco.social^
> ||trackswork.site^
> ||lesterunkind.top^
> ||sonraifishnet.website^

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2FPETEandrepete_%2Fstatus%2F1788379241815445981) ### Comment > I use the app “Downie” https://software.charliemonroe.net/downie/ to download audio, video, and images from various websites. One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. The URL is https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 and pasting this directly into Downie will cause an error "Error: Cannot find configuration URL.” > > If the URL is simply changed to https://twitter.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 then it downloads perfectly. > > This ONLY happens when AdGuard is running. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually. comment.body:
Да, указано в условиях задачи - Eset Smart Security. При этом проблема была протестирована таким образом:
1. Выключен антивирус и блокировщик - ФР: Работает.
2. Включен антивирус и выключен блокировщик -ФР: Работает.
3. Выключен антивирус включен блокировщик - ФР: Не работает.

Далее были проведены следующие диагностические мероприятия:
1. выключен антивирус, включен блокировщик и целиком выключены все возможные фильтры.
2. поочерёдно с выдержкой таймаута после включения были проверены все фильтры по одному.

Проблема воспроизвелась только при включении "Фильтрация HTTPS". При добавлении исключения доменного имени 4pda.to из фильтрации - сайт отображался, но при этом не работала фильтрация на этом портале (что и ожидалось).

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2FPETEandrepete_%2Fstatus%2F1788379241815445981) ### Comment > I use the app “Downie” https://software.charliemonroe.net/downie/ to download audio, video, and images from various websites. One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. The URL is https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 and pasting this directly into Downie will cause an error "Error: Cannot find configuration URL.” > > If the URL is simply changed to https://twitter.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 then it downloads perfectly. > > This ONLY happens when AdGuard is running. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually. ### Issue URL (Ads) [https://x.com/explore/tabs/keyword](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2Fexplore%2Ftabs%2Fkeyword) ### Comment > 該当箇所の広告が消える場合と消えない場合があります。 > > 広告がすり抜けて消えない場合は以下の操作で確認しました。 > iPhoneのSafariでx.comへ→iPhoneのホーム画面に追加→ホーム画面に追加されたx.comのアイコンから閲覧→該当箇所の広告だけがすりぬけて表示される。 > この表示はxのアカウント3つで検証した結果、3つのうち1つだけが広告がすりぬけて表示されるのを確認。（1枚目のスクリーンショットが広告すり抜けたアカウントのです。） > 残り2つは非表示されてます。（証拠として2枚目のスクリーンショットに広告が非表示されてるアカウントとのを添付しまくす。） > > 広告が非表示されてる場合 > iPhoneのSafariでx.comへ→該当箇所を表示 > この場合は3つのアカウント全てで広告が非表示されてる事を確認。 > > どうやらSafariでx.comをiPhoneのホーム画面に追加をした場合に、アカウントによって広告がすり抜ける場合があるようです。 > 該当箇所の広告がすり抜けたアカウントは、ホーム画面に追加したx.comを削除して再度やり押したり、x.comを再ログインしても効果はなかったです。 Username: `@Surumaill` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Переустановил на ночную сборку 7.18.0, импортировал настройки, отключил антивирус попробовал заново.
Результат ожидаемо такой же - именно это сайт не открывается.
![nightly](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/28299115/2f83b881-7a92-4df0-b526-47fdfd129a12)
В журнале работы приложения.
![logs](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/28299115/47d68b59-cdc0-4838-95b6-49fe172e58fd)
Также были проведены тест из следующих шагов:
1. сброшены параметры приложения до дефолтных.
2. проверка открытия сайта 4pda.to (ФР: портал открылся и работал).
3. включена фильтрация HTTPS, предлагаемая в приложении после сброса настроек.
4. проверка открытия сайта 4pda.to (ФР: портал не открылся).

comment.body:
@jellizaveta hi. so `tribunnews.com` has many domains
you can see the list here
https://www.tribunnews.com/tribun-network

for example there is a domain https://bekasi.tribunnews.com/
There are also https://banten.tribunnews.com/

at the front of the `tribunnews.com` domain are the names of cities in Indonesia

So each website has news which may be different depending on the city where the website was created

This is why websites have many domains

comment.body:
Для борьбы с этой рекламой просто правил блокировки недостаточно. Пожалуйста, установите дополнительное расширение AdGuard Extra, чтобы заблокировать рекламу на этом сайте.

* [Установить для Chrome, Edge или других браузеров на базе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить для Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
